creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: carved calligraphy panel; seven black characters carved on a vertical panel, light brown ground, with cloud style metal hanger at top center; for Wu House period room
text:
The couplet reads:

Solemnly we develop this hall as a place for courteous

interaction and harmonious family relationships.

From generation to generation we wholeheartedly

practice the traditional virtues of this village.
title: Calligraphy Panel, one of a pair
